jsondiscoverer.web

Class JsonComposerServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • jsondiscoverer.web.AbstractJsonDiscoverer
          • jsondiscoverer.web.JsonComposerServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JsonPathCalculatorServlet

    @WebServlet(value="/composer")
public class JsonComposerServlet
extends AbstractJsonDiscoverer
    Servlet providing access to JsonComposer

    Answers to POST HTTP calls. Receives as input a set JSON documents representing several JSON-based Web APIs (see paramsPattern to know the pattern the param has to follow).

    Discovers a graph representing the different APIs (as subgraphs) where nodes represents concepts/attributes and edges link concepts with their attributes. Additionally, extra edges are added to represent similar concepts and therefore potential composition links

    Graphs are encoded as GEXF.

    Author:
    Javier Canovas (me@jlcanovas.es)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • paramsPattern

        private static java.lang.String paramsPattern
        This pattern is used to analyze the params The format is sources[JSON_SOURCE_NAME][SOMETHING]([])?([input|output])? The important part is the JSON_SOURCE_NAME which provides the name of the parameter

      • doPost

        protected void doPost(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
               throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                      java.io.IOException
        Performs a POST call to this servlet.

        Receives a set of JSON documents representing different JSON-based Web services (see JsonComposerServlet.paramsPattern)to know the pattern of this param)

        Discovers a graph representing the different APIs (as subgraphs) where nodes represents concepts/attributes and edges link concepts with their attributes. Additionally, extra edges are added to represent similar concepts and therefore potential composition links

        Returns graph encoded as GEXF.

        Overrides:
        doPost in class javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        Parameters:
        request - The Request of the call
        response - The Response to the call
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        HttpServlet.doPost(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse)
